medical_history.chief_complaint: Rash on the extensor surfaces of hands, forearms, elbows, shoulders, flanks, and upper thighs associated with burning pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The rash has a 1-month history. It is nonpruritic and has been associated with burning pain. Patient has had no fevers, shortness of breath, recent viral syndromes, or recent travel.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of pancreatitis several years prior, recent repair of tibial fracture, ankle osteoarthritis, cholelithiasis, seizure disorder, and bipolar disorder.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of type 2 diabetes in his father and brother.
